videos.description: CJ McCollum drains bucket vs Indiana Pacers

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (CJ Mccollum drains bucket vs Indiana Pacers) 2021/11/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: CJ McCollum drains bucket vs Indiana Pacers

videos.description: Jusuf Nurkic strips the ball from Chris Duarte and Noram Powell capitalizes with the bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nurkic’s steal sets up Powell’s bucket) 2021/11/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nurkic's steal sets up Powell's bucket

videos.description: Norman Powell buries basket while getting fouled.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Powell connects on and-1 jumper) 2021/11/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Powell connects on and-1 jumper

videos.description: Cody Zeller finds a cutting Robert Covington for the emphatic one-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Covington rises high for the jam) 2021/11/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Covington rises high for the jam

videos.description: Norman Powell goes baseline and flushes home the one-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Powell goes baseline for the dunk) 2021/11/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Powell goes baseline for the dunk

videos.description: Chris Duarte gets out in transition for the impressive and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Duarte attacks the basket for the and-1) 2021/11/06 ESHEET

videos.headline: Duarte attacks the basket for the and-1

videos.description: After falling behind by nine late in the fourth, the Blazers get big baskets especially from Robert Covington in a win over Pacers.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Blazers come up clutch down the stretch for win) 2021/11/06 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Blazers come up clutch down the stretch for win
